content.raw: I was also confused about this at first but @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} seems to think that the nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed is built from the linked dockerfile. It looks reasonable to me but I would also like a confirmation from @{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} . Additionally, I am also wondering if any future changes to the docker file would be published alongside a new image?
content.html: I was also confused about this at first but @Alfredo Bencomo seems to think that the nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed is built from the linked dockerfile. It looks reasonable to me but I would also like a confirmation from @Nate Koenig . Additionally, I am also wondering if any future changes to the docker file would be published alongside a new image?
